name: Mr. Jetpack
description:
Mr.Jetpack flies everyday from his home to his work although most of his flights are without problems this day seemed a little bit off.
Shooting Bullets, rockets and flying crates are making his road back to home really tough but he needs to go back home because if he doesnt come home before the night falls in his wife Mrs.Jetpack gets very angry and if Mrs.Jetpack gets very angry Mr.Jetpack wont recognize his own kids anymore the next day and he doesnt want that to happen. So he needs your help in getting through the sky back safely to his home.
Help him dodge Obstacles and try to get a really high Score to make him extra Happy and if you want you can even compare these Scores with your friends to get as much people helping Mr.Jetpack get back to Home.
